item.title: Week 2 - 2025
item.description:
Week two of 2025 was about polishing small tools and catching up on good stories. Here’s what kept me busy.

Things I built this week

Projects

  • Whoop Dashboard – small dashboard to explore training and recovery data; first pass of visualizations is live. Link
  • Barista Tracker – logging and improving espresso shots; dialing in workflow and notes. Link
  • Website – Created this website Link

Things I liked this week

Podcast

  • Today, Explained – AI music is here – fun look at generated music and the legal/creative chaos around it. (Link)

Shows / Movies

  • Pluribus – gripping story about human limits vs. clever machines; nice blend of drama and tech.

Videos

  • 39C3 – The Heartbreak Machine: Nazis in the Echo Chamber (Link)
  • 39C3 – Hacking washing machines (Link)
  • Wie ImmoScout24 MILLIONEN druckt (German) (Link)

Wrapped the week feeling lighter code-wise and with a refreshed watchlist.
